mapper.select: SELECT a.product_id, a.title, a.retail_price, CASE a.is_dc WHEN 'Y' THEN ROUND(a.sales_price*0.9,-2) ELSE a.sales_price END AS sales_price, CONCAT(b.file_path, '/', b.file_nm) AS thumb_img FROM tb_product a INNER JOIN tb_img_file_info b ON a.thumb_img_no = b.img_no WHERE 1=1 AND a.is_new = 'Y' ORDER BY a.reg_dt desc LIMIT 5

SELECT a.product_id, a.title, a.retail_price, CASE a.is_dc WHEN 'Y' THEN ROUND(a.sales_price*0.9,-2) ELSE a.sales_price END AS sales_price, CONCAT(b.file_path, '/', b.file_nm) AS thumb_img FROM tb_product a INNER JOIN tb_img_file_info b ON a.thumb_img_no = b.img_no INNER JOIN tb_product_category c ON a.category_no = c.category_no INNER JOIN tb_brand_type d ON c.brand_no = d.brand_no WHERE 1=1 AND d.p_brand_no = #{id} ${order_by} LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}

SELECT a.product_id, a.title, a.retail_price, CASE a.is_dc WHEN 'Y' THEN ROUND(a.sales_price*0.9,-2) ELSE a.sales_price END AS sales_price, CONCAT(b.file_path, '/', b.file_nm) AS thumb_img FROM tb_product a INNER JOIN tb_img_file_info b ON a.thumb_img_no = b.img_no INNER JOIN tb_product_category c ON a.category_no = c.category_no WHERE 1=1 AND c.brand_no = #{id} ${order_by} LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM tb_product
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM tb_product WHERE is_dc = 'Y'

WITH CTE AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS list_cnt FROM tb_product a INNER JOIN tb_product_category b ON a.category_no = b.category_no INNER JOIN tb_craft_type c ON b.craft_no = c.craft_no WHERE 1=1 AND c.craft_no = #{craft_no} ) SELECT craft_nm AS `title`, b.list_cnt, CONCAT('홈 > ',craft_nm) AS `path` FROM tb_craft_type a CROSS JOIN CTE b WHERE 1=1 AND craft_no = #{craft_no}

WITH CTE AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS list_cnt FROM tb_product a INNER JOIN tb_product_category b ON a.category_no = b.category_no WHERE 1=1 AND b.category_no = #{category_no} ) SELECT category_nm AS `title`, c.list_cnt, CONCAT('홈 > ',craft_nm,' > ', category_nm) AS `path` FROM tb_product_category a INNER JOIN tb_craft_type b ON a.craft_no = b.craft_no CROSS JOIN CTE c WHERE 1=1 AND a.category_no = #{category_no}

WITH CTE AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS list_cnt FROM tb_product a INNER JOIN tb_product_category b ON a.category_no = b.category_no INNER JOIN tb_brand_type c ON b.brand_no = c.brand_no WHERE 1=1 AND c.p_brand_no = #{p_brand_no} ) SELECT a.brand_nm AS `title`, b.list_cnt, CONCAT('홈 > ',brand_nm) AS `path` FROM tb_brand_type a CROSS JOIN CTE b WHERE 1=1 AND brand_no = #{p_brand_no}

WITH CTE AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS list_cnt FROM tb_product a INNER JOIN tb_product_category b ON a.category_no = b.category_no INNER JOIN tb_brand_type c ON b.brand_no = c.brand_no WHERE 1=1 AND c.brand_no = #{brand_no} ) SELECT a.brand_nm AS `title`, c.list_cnt, CONCAT('홈 > ',b.brand_nm,' > ',a.brand_nm) AS `path` FROM tb_brand_type a INNER JOIN tb_brand_type b ON a.p_brand_no = b.brand_no CROSS JOIN CTE c WHERE 1=1 AND a.brand_no = #{brand_no}

SELECT a.product_id, a.title, a.retail_price, CASE a.is_dc WHEN 'Y' THEN ROUND(a.sales_price*0.9,-2) ELSE a.sales_price END AS sales_price FROM tb_product a INNER JOIN tb_product_detail b ON a.product_id = b.product_id WHERE 1=1 AND a.product_id = #{product_id}
SELECT CONCAT(b.file_path, '/', b.file_nm) FROM tb_product_img a INNER JOIN tb_img_file_info b ON a.img_no = b.img_no WHERE 1=1 AND a.product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product (`title`, `retail_price`, `sales_price`, `is_new`, `is_best`, `is_dc`, `thumb_img_no`, `category_no`) VALUES ( #{title}, #{retail_price}, #{sales_price}, IFNULL(#{is_new},'N'), IFNULL(#{is_best},'N'), IFNULL(#{is_dc},'N'), #{thumb_img_no}, (SELECT category_no FROM tb_product_category WHERE brand_no = #{brand_no} AND craft_no = #{craft_no}) )

INSERT INTO tb_product_img(product_id, img_no, reg_dt) VALUES
(#{item.product_id}, #{item.img_no}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_product SET title = #{title}, retail_price = #{retail_price}, sales_price = #{sales_price}, is_new = IFNULL(#{is_new},'N'), is_best = IFNULL(#{is_best},'N'), is_dc = IFNULL(#{is_dc},'N'), category_no =(SELECT category_no FROM tb_product_category WHERE brand_no = #{brand_no} AND craft_no = #{craft_no}), upd_dt = NOW() WHERE product_id = #{product_id}
UPDATE tb_product_detail SET stock_cnt = #{stock_cnt}, upd_dt = NOW() WHERE product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.product_id, a.title, a.retail_price, CASE a.is_dc WHEN 'Y' THEN ROUND(a.sales_price*0.9,-2) ELSE a.sales_price END AS sales_price, b.stock_cnt, a.is_new, a.is_best, a.is_dc, d.craft_no, e.p_brand_no, d.brand_no, c.img_no, CONCAT(c.file_path, '/', c.file_nm) AS img_path FROM tb_product a INNER JOIN tb_product_detail b ON a.product_id = b.product_id INNER JOIN tb_img_file_info c ON a.thumb_img_no = c.img_no INNER JOIN tb_product_category d ON a.category_no = d.category_no INNER JOIN tb_brand_type e ON d.brand_no = e.brand_no WHERE 1=1 AND a.product_id = #{product_id}
SELECT a.img_no, CONCAT(b.file_path, '/', b.file_nm) AS img_path FROM tb_product_img a INNER JOIN tb_img_file_info b ON a.img_no = b.img_no WHERE 1=1 AND a.product_id = #{product_id}
